about_the_game:
Welcome to the Middle World - a purgatory dimension where people's souls go to after they die. In the Middle World people have to complete tasks to atone for their wrongdoings or settle any unfinished matters and emotional traumas before their final destination can be decided.

As a newly arrived, Julius has to seek forgiveness of those whose lives he ruined in life. But with no memories of his Earth life, the task wouldn't be easy. He has to make friends and connections and find out more about this world - a world that exists in a permanent twilight time of the day, has a futuristic cyberpunk flare, and where it is impossible to die, while pain and suffering are all as real as they can be.

While uncovering our past and facing its challenges, we also must face the ever-unpredictable politics and dangers of the Middle World, with different groups contending for power and influence, covert alliances and secret deals, and parasitic creatures that feed on people's suffering. And perhaps in the midst of this chaos we can build a meaningful connection with someone, whose fate will intertwine with our own and seal our final path.

General Features:

  • A visual novel with choices to make on how to act or what to say, which impacts our standing with others, as well as some of the future events and endings.

  • Relationship and trust building with different individuals and even a faction. From these, there are three different romantic interests to build a deeper connection with.

  • Three attributes: Virtue, Callosity, and Defiance. How we act will cause different attributes to increase, which in turn can unlock some dialogue options and even entire game endings.

  • Uncover the mystery of Julius' past and what brought him to this world to seek forgiveness.

  • 16 different endings that depend on our decisions and the relationships we've built.

  • Fully-rendered 3D images of characters and events as they unfold in each scene.

content_descriptors.notes:
Images and sounds of sexual scenes with full nudity.
Occasional violence and fights with fantasy and sci-fi flare, fatal accidents, suicide.

name: Interim Crossroads

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 / DirectX 9 / 1280 x 720 resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A visual novel with choices and consequences, set in a purgatory dimension where we must complete certain tasks before we are deemed worthy to move on. Build trust and romance, confront the past, and choose the future.
